Condor::

Condor continue his travel, his mission shouldn't delay.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> (OOC: Oops, seems I misread some posts. I apologize.)
> 
>  
> 
> Vampirtron:
> 
>      Vampirtron had rested for a bit in his room, when he got bored 
he got up and walked out, into the ship. He was admiring the 
Maximal's design of the ship, they almost seemed perfect, yet flawed 
as well.
> 
>      Eventually he found his way outside, he transformed to beast 
mode and started to wander the wilds. About a mile away from the ship 
he noticed a bird flying overhead, he did a quick scan and found that 
it had a Maximal signal*. So Vampirtron ran into a field and let out 
a deep, long howl. After that he transformed to robot mode, and stood 
with one knee on a big rock, watching the bird, to see if it would 
land.
> 
> (*The signal is Condor)
> 
> 
>
